items.title: Awesome Webxr
items.content_text:
### Social Spaces / Other

items.title: Awesome Data Engineering
items.content_text:
### Workflow

*   [Kestra (⭐20k)](https://github.com/kestra-io/kestra) - A versatile open source orchestrator and scheduler built on Java, designed to handle a broad range of workflows with a language-agnostic, API-first architecture.
items.content_html:
Workflow

  • Kestra (⭐20k) - A versatile open source orchestrator and scheduler built on Java, designed to handle a broad range of workflows with a language-agnostic, API-first architecture.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### John Hopcroft / Commonsense Knowledgebase

*   [Introduction to Automata Theory, Languages, and Computation](http://elib.vku.udn.vn/bitstream/123456789/2543/1/2007.%20Introduction%20to%20Automata%20Theory%2C%20Languages%2C%20and%20Computations%20%283rd%20edition%29.pdf) - ***Pearson***, 2007. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=326269839585842480)].
*   [Foundations of Data Science](http://www.cs.cornell.edu/jeh/book%20no%20so;utions%20March%202019.pdf) - ***Cambridge University Press***. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?oi=bibs\&hl=en\&cluster=1802704438630899850)].
items.content_html:
John Hopcroft / Commonsense Knowledgebase

  • Introduction to Automata Theory, Languages, and Computation - Pearson, 2007. [All Versions].
  • Foundations of Data Science - Cambridge University Press. [All Versions].

items.title: Static Analysis
items.content_text:
### Programming Languages / [Other](#other-1)

*   [i-Code CNES for Fortran (⭐64)](https://github.com/lequal/i-CodeCNES) — An open source static code analysis tool for Fortran 77, Fortran 90 and Shell.
*   [nimfmt (⭐86)](https://github.com/FedericoCeratto/nimfmt) — Nim code formatter / linter / style checker
*   [i-Code CNES for Shell (⭐64)](https://github.com/lequal/i-CodeCNES) — An open source static code analysis tool for Shell and Fortran (77 and 90).
items.content_html:
Programming Languages / Other

  • i-Code CNES for Fortran (⭐64) — An open source static code analysis tool for Fortran 77, Fortran 90 and Shell.
  • nimfmt (⭐86) — Nim code formatter / linter / style checker
  • i-Code CNES for Shell (⭐64) — An open source static code analysis tool for Shell and Fortran (77 and 90).

items.title: Awesome React Components
items.content_text:
### Screenshot

*   [html2canvas (⭐31k)](https://github.com/niklasvh/html2canvas) - Take screenshots of any part of your web page using Javascript.

### Responsive / Syntax Highlight

*   [shadcn/ui (⭐91k)](https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui) - [demo](https://ui.shadcn.com/examples/mail) - [docs](https://ui.shadcn.com/docs) - Beautifully designed components that you can copy and paste into your apps.

### Miscellaneous / Lazy Load

*   [iron-session (⭐4k)](https://github.com/vvo/iron-session) - Secure, stateless, and cookie-based session library.
items.content_html:
Screenshot

  • html2canvas (⭐31k) - Take screenshots of any part of your web page using Javascript.

Responsive / Syntax Highlight

  • shadcn/ui (⭐91k) - demo - docs - Beautifully designed components that you can copy and paste into your apps.

Miscellaneous / Lazy Load

  • iron-session (⭐4k) - Secure, stateless, and cookie-based session library.

items.title: Awesome Micropython
items.content_text:
### IO / ADC

*   [CS1237 (⭐2)](https://github.com/robert-hh/CS1237) - MicroPython driver for the CS1237 ADC.

### Sensors / Load Cell

*   [micropython-hx711 (⭐82)](https://github.com/SergeyPiskunov/micropython-hx711) - MicroPython driver for HX711 24-Bit Analog-to-Digital Converter.
*   [hx710 (⭐11)](https://github.com/QuirkyCort/IoTy/blob/main/public/extensions/hx710.py) - MicroPython driver for the HX710.
*   [hx711 (⭐62)](https://github.com/robert-hh/hx711) - MicroPython driver for the HX711 load cell interface.
*   [hx710 (⭐2)](https://github.com/robert-hh/hx710) - MicroPython driver for the HX710 load cell interface.
items.content_html:
IO / ADC

  • CS1237 (⭐2) - MicroPython driver for the CS1237 ADC.

Sensors / Load Cell

  • micropython-hx711 (⭐82) - MicroPython driver for HX711 24-Bit Analog-to-Digital Converter.
  • hx710 (⭐11) - MicroPython driver for the HX710.
  • hx711 (⭐62) - MicroPython driver for the HX711 load cell interface.
  • hx710 (⭐2) - MicroPython driver for the HX710 load cell interface.

items.title: Awesome Go
items.content_text:
### Caches

*   [icache (⭐21)](https://github.com/mdaliyan/icache) - A High Performance, Generic, thread-safe, zero-dependency cache package.

### Translation

*   [ctxi18n (⭐72)](https://github.com/invopop/ctxi18n/) - Context aware i18n with a short and consise API, pluralization, interpolation, and `fs.FS` support. YAML locale definitions are based on [Rails i18n](https://guides.rubyonrails.org/i18n.html).

### ORM

*   [bob (⭐1.4k)](https://github.com/stephenafamo/bob) - SQL query builder and ORM/Factory generator for Go. Successor of SQLBoiler.

### Security

*   [acopw-go](https://sr.ht/~jamesponddotco/acopw-go/) - Small cryptographically secure password generator package for Go.

### Third-party APIs

*   [go-salesforce (⭐44)](https://github.com/k-capehart/go-salesforce) - Go client library for interacting with the [Salesforce REST API](https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.api_rest.meta/api_rest/resources_list.htm).

### Utilities

*   [Failsafe-go (⭐1.8k)](https://github.com/failsafe-go/failsafe-go) - Fault tolerance and resilience patterns for Go.
items.content_html:
Caches

  • icache (⭐21) - A High Performance, Generic, thread-safe, zero-dependency cache package.

Translation

  • ctxi18n (⭐72) - Context aware i18n with a short and consise API, pluralization, interpolation, and fs.FS support. YAML locale definitions are based on Rails i18n.

ORM

  • bob (⭐1.4k) - SQL query builder and ORM/Factory generator for Go. Successor of SQLBoiler.

Security

  • acopw-go - Small cryptographically secure password generator package for Go.

Third-party APIs

  • go-salesforce (⭐44) - Go client library for interacting with the Salesforce REST API.

Utilities

  • Failsafe-go (⭐1.8k) - Fault tolerance and resilience patterns for Go.

items.title: Awesome Eslint
items.content_text:
### Configs / Other Prominent Configs (100 stars or so)

*   [Antfu Eslint Config (⭐5.4k)](https://github.com/antfu/eslint-config) - Anthony's ESLint config preset.

### Preconfigured Configs with ESLint Set up / Other Configs

*   [eslint-config-prettier (⭐5.7k)](https://github.com/prettier/eslint-config-prettier) - Prettier config for ESlint maintained by Prettier team.

### Parsers / Testing Tools

*   [babel-eslint-parser (⭐44k)](https://github.com/babel/babel/tree/main/eslint/babel-eslint-parser) - Allows you to lint ALL valid Babel code with the fantastic ESLint.

### Formatters / Testing Tools

*   [html (⭐38)](https://github.com/shuoshubao/eslint-formatter-html) - A enhanced ESLint formatter.
items.content_html:
Configs / Other Prominent Configs (100 stars or so)

  • Antfu Eslint Config (⭐5.4k) - Anthony's ESLint config preset.

Preconfigured Configs with ESLint Set up / Other Configs

  • eslint-config-prettier (⭐5.7k) - Prettier config for ESlint maintained by Prettier team.

Parsers / Testing Tools

  • babel-eslint-parser (⭐44k) - Allows you to lint ALL valid Babel code with the fantastic ESLint.

Formatters / Testing Tools

  • html (⭐38) - A enhanced ESLint formatter.

items.title: Awesome Irc
items.content_text:
### Clients

*   [KvIRC](https://www.kvirc.net) - Free, portable, based on Qt GUI toolkit. ([source (⭐256)](https://github.com/kvirc/KVIrc)) `Linux` `macOS` `Windows`
*   [Goguma](https://sr.ht/~emersion/goguma/) - An IRC client for mobile devices, from the creator of soju. `Android` `Linux`

### Bouncers / Self-hosted

*   [sms-webhook (⭐1)](https://github.com/terminaldweller/sms-webhook) - A simple webhook to receive SMS messages on IRC. `Go`

### Services / Self-hosted

*   [anope](https://www.anope.org) - Designed for flexibility and ease of use. ([source (⭐329)](https://github.com/anope/anope))

### Bots / Self-hosted

*   [Eggdrop](https://www.eggheads.org) - Oldest IRC bot still in active development. Feature rich, uses Tcl scripting. ([source (⭐536)](https://github.com/eggheads/eggdrop)) `C`
*   [milla (⭐14)](https://github.com/terminaldweller/milla) - New generation LLM-powered bot with lua scripting support. `Go`

### Frameworks / Self-hosted

*   [irccd](https://projects.malikania.fr/irccd/index.html) - Flexible IRC bot customizable with JavaScript. `C++`.

### Frameworks / Bridges

*   [matterircd (⭐297)](https://github.com/42wim/matterircd) - Matterbridge ↔ IRC, Slack ↔ IRC, Mastodon ↔ IRC. `Go`

### Miscellaneous / Platforms

*   [img2src (⭐39)](https://github.com/waveplate/img2irc) - Convert images to halfblock ANSI or IRC, with a bunch of post-processing filters. `Rust`
items.content_html:
Clients

  • KvIRC - Free, portable, based on Qt GUI toolkit. (source (⭐256)) Linux macOS Windows
  • Goguma - An IRC client for mobile devices, from the creator of soju. Android Linux

Bouncers / Self-hosted

  • sms-webhook (⭐1) - A simple webhook to receive SMS messages on IRC. Go

Services / Self-hosted

  • anope - Designed for flexibility and ease of use. (source (⭐329))

Bots / Self-hosted

  • Eggdrop - Oldest IRC bot still in active development. Feature rich, uses Tcl scripting. (source (⭐536)) C
  • milla (⭐14) - New generation LLM-powered bot with lua scripting support. Go

Frameworks / Self-hosted

  • irccd - Flexible IRC bot customizable with JavaScript. C++.

Frameworks / Bridges

  • matterircd (⭐297) - Matterbridge ↔ IRC, Slack ↔ IRC, Mastodon ↔ IRC. Go

Miscellaneous / Platforms

  • img2src (⭐39) - Convert images to halfblock ANSI or IRC, with a bunch of post-processing filters. Rust
